section.p: Perfmon counter data are collected through the PowerShell Get-Counter cmdlet, within a remote shell (WinRS). To collect data from any other Perfmon counter, simply add the counter to the appropriate monitoring template.
section.note:
The following Processes metrics (Win32_PerfFormattedData_PerfProc_Process) are collected directly through Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI).
PercentProcessorTime
WorkingSet
WorkingSetPrivate (not available on Windows 2003)
